Articles.Author: Joey Paur
Articles.Title: Quentin Tarantino Shares Details on the James Bond Film He Never Got to Make
Articles.Description: After Quentin Tarantino made Pulp Fiction, the director attempted to make a James Bond movie, and his plan was to do an adaptation of the Ian Fleming novel Casino Royal. The director had a vision for this adaptation, and he would’ve set the story in the 1960s…
